mensData.description: Pro gamer? We got you. A do-it-all hustler? Even better! Airdopes 115 is the perfect choice for both worlds. Its 13mm drivers will make you experience a thumping bass and drown you in the unbeatable boAt Signature Sound. Get the gamer to win matches with minimum lag powered by BEAST™ Mode. Call disturbance will never be an issue with ENx™ technology that makes calls crystal clear for you. So, pick from its dynamic colours & vibe limitless with its 24HRS playback.
